translations: 使……无害；给……消毒；对……采取卫生措施

sentences.sentence: The three girls needed to sanitize all the donations and make sure all food packages were not broken.
sentences.translation: 这三个女孩需要对所有捐赠品进行消毒，并确保所有食品包装没有破损。

sentences.sentence: Cake's Sanitize class makes it easy to clean up your data.
sentences.translation: Cake的sanitize类使得清理您的数据变得很容易。

sentences.sentence: It's up to you to determine which Sanitize method is best used.
sentences.translation: 使用哪一个Sanitize方法由您决定。
